description:
Wow! Raymond gets more and more aggressive each time he gets fucked!
"It was kind of weird the first time I did it," he told me. "But..."
"Now you like it?" I asked.
"Yeah," he said (like I had just caught him with his hand in the cookie jar). "It feels good."
Now, if you like hair you will love this film.
Both Raymond and Jarek are nice and furry, with dark hair covering their muscular bodies.
My favorite part: when Jarek breeds Raymond!
"That was pretty damn hot!" I said afterwards. "How did it feel?"
"It felt kind of naughty!" Jarek said, laughing...
title: Raymond & Jarek: Bareback
